title: 193: Correcting muscle imbalances to prevent/overcome injury & improve posture
description: If you have muscle imbalances you are setting yourself up for injury. It also contributes to posture that will make your body less aesthetically pleasing to other. Sal, Adam & Justin cover what causes muscle imbalances and how to correct them. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpradio.com
